content.rendered:
WE ARE GREENLIGHT FILMS

A FILM PRODUCTION COMPANY IN BANGKOK, THAILAND

Welcome to Greenlight Films, your partner in making your movie “magic” happen! We’re a leading film production company headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand, providing full production and production services for a wide range of projects including feature films, scripted and unscripted TV, TV commercials, music videos, network series, branded content, and photoshoots.

We thrive on creative challenges and are always willing to take on any project, big or small.

We’ve worked with clients from all over the world, including Europe, the US, China, and Australia, with whom we’ve successfully completed projects in Thailand and with our local team all over Asia (Singapore, Vietnam, Malaysia, Cambodia, Philippines, Indonesia, Laos, Hong Kong, Myanmar, Maldives, Australia) , and the US ( Las Vegas).

Whether you are a Hollywood studio or an independent filmmaker, we are here to help you achieve your vision. 

Let’s Make Magic!

OUR WORK

Rainn Wilson and the Geography of Bliss
Peacock Orignial

Queen of the Jungle (S1)

NEED TO KNOW
ALLE FARBEN FT. FLYNN

GilletteSecondShave – อ่อนโยนในแบบพ่อ

McDang’s Travelogue

The Real World

NON SONO UN ASSASSINO di Andrea
Zaccariello (2019)
I’m Not a Murderer
